attributes.action: NEVER EVER BRING BACK NATIONAL SERVICE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: National service is unfair. If like me some young people object to war/conflict etc and choose to never think of joining the armed forces, we shouldn't be forced to. Young people have things hard enough already these days contrary to popular belief

rejection.details: Please resubmit without BLOCK CAPS, as they are more difficult to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
